About Me!

28 Jul 2014

Hello World!!

Greetings from Nepal!!

I am Avash Mulmi, usually going by the nick Avasz around internet.
I love Open Source technologies and believe in Open Web.

Volunteer at OLE Nepal, FOSS Nepal & Mozilla.
Representative of Mozilla
Studying Computer Engineering in Tribhuvan University
